text:
Good morning,

In version 2.1.1 I've changed the AxisGraph class to create fancier
(IMHO) bar charts. Moreover it computes automatically the y-axis limit.

I was wondering if it'd be possible to include this updated feature in
future releases

Thanks.

Quasar
creator: quasar7@gmail.com

text:
thanks for the contribution. I've checked in the change and it should be in the
nightly build. I've also added your name to the contributors page

http://wiki.apache.org/jakarta-jmeter/JMeterCommitters?action=show

thanks

peter lin
creator: woolfel@yahoo.com
